description.name: Cordless Drill 18V Li-Ion
description.long_desc:
• GEKO Cordless Drill 18V OnePower Series with 45 Nm of torque. 2-speed transmission: optimized for high-torque driving and high speed drilling. Provides 19+1 clutch settings.


    Batteries and charger sold separately.


    Product Features



    • Torque 45 Nm

    • 2-speed transmission

    • Chuck size 1/2 In. (13mm)

    • Battery load indicator

    • Powered with Li-Ion battery 18V

    • One handed forward/reverse

    • Belt clip

    • Battery not included


    Technical Data



    • Torque: 45 Nm

    • No Load RPM: 0-400/min / 0-1400/min

    • Chuck Size: 1/2" (13mm)

    • Clutch Settings: 19+1

    • Battery Voltage: 18V

    • Power Source: Battery powered

    • Material: High Density Plastic, Rubber, Aluminum

    • Waga: 1290 g (bez akumulatora)


    Check out the tool test on Youtube:

description.name: Cordles Circular Saw 18V Li-Ion
description.long_desc:
Cordless Circualar Saw is ideal for working on MDF, plywood and timber. Features 24-tooth TCT blade with diameter of 136mm.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • 0 - 3800 rpm no load speed

  • Depth adjustment 0 - 40 mm

  • 38 mm maximum cutting depth at 90°

  • 136 mm diameter blade

  • Tool less depth & bevel adjustment


Technical Data



  • No Load RPM: 0 - 3800

  • Maximum Cutting Depth at 90°: 38 mm

  • Maximum Cutting Depth at 45°: 28 mm

  • Bevel Cutting Angle: 0 - 50°

  • Blade Diameter: 136 mm

  • Disc Bore Size: 10 mm

  • Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Battery powered

  • Material: High Density Plastic, Rubber


Check out the tool test on Youtube:

description.name: Cordless Reciprocating Saw 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Cordless Reciprocating Saw 18V.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • Powered with Li-ion battery 18V 2Ah or 4Ah

  • Tool-free blade change

  • Locking on switch for reducing fatigue on long jobs

  • Ergonomic Softgrip

  • Regulated shoe plate

  • Fitted with 1 blade


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion battery 2Ah / 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Stroke Rate: 0-2400 spm

  • Stroke Lengths: 22 mm

  • Max. Cutting Depth: 100 mm

description.name: Cordless Jig Saw 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Cordless Jig Saw 18V.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • Powered with 18V battery 2Ah or 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Maximum cutting depth: 51 mm

  • Mitre cuts 0 / 15 / 30 / 45°

  • Tool-free blades change

  • 4-position orbital cut control

  • Metal guide ruler for 10mm~160mm accurate cutting


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion battery 2Ah / 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Stroke Rate at No Load:: 0-2400 spm

  • Stroke Height: 19 mm

  • Cutting Depth in Wood: 51 mm

  • Cutting Depth in Metal: 2 mm

  • Mitre Cuts: 0 / 15 / 30 / 45°

description.name: Cordles Flashlight 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Cordless Work Shop Flashlight 18V 300 lux 3W. Operating time up to 6 hours.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features


  • Brightness 300 lux due to 3 power LEDs

  • 9 settable lighting angles: from 0 to 135°

  • Working time up to 6 hours

  • Powered with Li-Ion battery 18V

    • Technical Data



    • Brightness: 300 lux

    • Power: 3W

    • Light Source: 3x LED

    • Operating Time: up to 6 hours

    • Lighting Angle: 9-settings (0 - 135°)

    • Voltage: 18V

    • Power Source: Battery powered

description.name: Cordless Impact Drill 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Cordless Impact Drill 18V. Ideal for screwing and drilling in concrete, wood and metal.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • SDS-Plus chuck for quick, secure, tool-free bit changes

  • Fitted with Drill Chuck adapter

  • Powered with 18V battery 2Ah or 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Pneumatic hammer mechanism

  • LED light: illuminates work area to increase visibility


Max. Drilling Diameter



  • Metal: up to 8 mm

  • Concrete: up to 10 mm

  • Wood: up to 16 mm


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion battery 2Ah or 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Rated Speed: 0-900 rpm

  • Impact Rate at Rated Speed: 4300 bmp

description.name: Cordless Multi-function Tool with Accessory 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Powerful and versatile Multi-function Tool 18V with 3° oscillation angle for sawing, cutting, grinding, polishing and scraping materials.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • Powered with 18V battery 2Ah or 4Ah

  • 3° oscillation

  • 6 variable speeds between 5000 and 18000 opm

  • Anti-restart function prevents accidental start-ups

  • Comfort ergonomic grip

  • Tool free blade change


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion battery 2Ah or 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Oscillations per Minute: 5000 - 18000 opm

  • Oscillation Angle: 3°

  • Application: sawing, cutting, grinding, polishing, scraping, etc.

description.name: Cordless Angle Grinder 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
GEKO Cordless Angle Grinder 18V Li-Ion OnePower Series.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • Comfort ergonomic softgrip

  • Multi position side handle

  • Spindle size M14


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion 18V battery 2Ah or 4Ah OnePower Series

  • Wheel Diameter: 115 mm

  • Bore Diameter: 22,23 mm

  • Spindle Thread: M14

  • No Load Speed: 8000 rpm

description.name: Cordless Impact Wrench 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Compact design lightweight Impact Wrench delivers 150Nm torque.


Product Features



  • Maximum torque 150 Nm

  • 1/2" square drive

  • Powered with Li-Ion 18V battery

  • Battery load indicator

  • One handed forward/reverse function

  • Belt clip

  • Battery not included


Technical Data



  • Torque Maximum: 150 Nm

  • No Load BPM: 0 - 3000

  • No Load RPM: 0 - 2400

  • Drive: 1/2 In. Square Drive

  • Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Battery powered

  • Material: High Density Plastic, Rubber, Aluminum

  • Weight: 1135 g (without battery)

description.name: Cordless Mouse Detail Sander 18V Li-ion
description.long_desc:
Cordless Mouse Detail Sander 18V. Versatile and compact perfect for sanding and polishing in tight spaces.


Batteries and charger sold separately.


Product Features



  • Sanding sheets size: Delta 140 x 140 x 100mm

  • Velcro-type fastening for fast and easy sanding sheet changes

  • Compact and handy - ideal for use in hard-to-reach areas

  • Ready for use with external dust extraction device


Technical Data



  • Battery Voltage: 18V

  • Power Source: Li-Ion battery 2Ah

  • No-load Orbital Stroke Rate: 10 000 opm

  • Oscillating Circuit Diameter: 2 mm

  • Sanding Sheets: Delta 140 x 140 x 100mm

  • External dust extraction: yes

description.name: 4-Tine Digging Fork with Steel D-Handle
description.long_desc:
Garden fork with metal handle is an essential tool for every gardening enthusiast. With its help, you can easily and effectively dig and turn the soil, remove weeds, plant plants and much more.


Product characteristics:



  • Comfortable handle: Long, black handle with ergonomic grip ensures comfort and ease of use. You don't have to worry about blisters, hand pain or excessive fatigue.

  • 4 strong curved teeth at the end of the handle are designed for effective digging and turning the soil. They are resistant to bending, cracking and corrosion.

  • Durable material: The entire construction except for the handle is made of metal, which guarantees durability and strength.
description.short_desc:

  • Durable material: The entire construction except for the handle is made of metal, which guarantees durability and strength.

description.name: Grabie ergo 14-zębne trzon metalowy
description.long_desc:
Grabie EGRO sprawdzają się jako grabie ogrodnicze, grabie dla ogrodnika, grabie do ogrodu oraz grabie do firmy. Grabie posiadają trzon wykonany z wysokiej jakości metalu, który jest idealnie wyprofilowany zapewniając ergonomię i wygodę podczas pracy. 14 zębne grabie zapewniają wygodną i mało męczącą pracę.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • trzon wykonany z wysokiej jakości metalu, który jest idealnie wyprofilowany zapewniając ergonomię i wygodę
  • Sprawdzają się jako grabie ogrodnicze, grabie dla ogrodnika, grabie do ogrodu oraz grabie do firmy.
  • 14 zębne grabie zapewniają wygodną i mało męczącą pracę.
description.short_desc:

Grabie posiadają trzon wykonany z wysokiej jakości metalu, który jest idealnie wyprofilowany zapewniając ergonomię i wygodę podczas pracy. 14 zębne grabie zapewniają wygodną i mało męczącą pracę.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • trzon wykonany z wysokiej jakości metalu, który jest idealnie wyprofilowany zapewniając ergonomię i wygodę
  • Sprawdzają się jako grabie ogrodnicze, grabie dla ogrodnika, grabie do ogrodu oraz grabie do firmy.
  • 14 zębne grabie zapewniają wygodną i mało męczącą pracę.
description.description:
Grabie EGRO sprawdzają się jako grabie ogrodnicze, grabie dla ogrodnika, grabie do ogrodu oraz grabie do firmy. Grabie posiadają trzon wykonany z wysokiej jakości metalu, który jest idealnie wyprofilowany zapewniając ergonomię i wygodę podczas pracy. 14 zębne grabie zapewniają wygodną i mało męczącą pracę.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • trzon wykonany z wysokiej jakości metalu, który jest idealnie wyprofilowany zapewniając ergonomię i wygodę
  • Sprawdzają się jako grabie ogrodnicze, grabie dla ogrodnika, grabie do ogrodu oraz grabie do firmy.
  • 14 zębne grabie zapewniają wygodną i mało męczącą pracę.

description.name: 16-Tine Ergonomic Rake
description.long_desc:
ERGO 16-TOOTH RAKE 41CM WITH METAL HANDLE



  • Material: high-quality steel

  • Number of teeth: 16

  • Head width: 41 cm

  • Rake length: 155 cm

  • Color: black-blue

  • Non-slip overlay for improved work comfort

  • Perfect for garden cleanup in the fall and for spreading gravel, sand, or soil

description.name: Manual Hand Drill Digger Earth Auger 200 mm
description.long_desc:
Coal Shovel with Wooden Handle


This shovel is made from high-quality, powder-coated steel. It features a securely attached wooden handle and a comfortable plastic grip. Perfect for loading and unloading coal.


Specifications:



  • Material: Powder-coated steel

  • Color: Black

  • Handle: Wooden

  • Shovel Dimensions: 28 x 36 cm

  • Total Height: 120 cm
